requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any.

results.name: Blue and sentimental Chapter 1: the lost wallet
